alert.note: Alert for Adams; Highland; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ADAMS, PIKE, EAST CENTRAL HIGHLAND, NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO AND SOUTH CENTRAL ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Peebles, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Waverly, Piketon, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Cynthiana, Sinking Spring, Poplar Grove, Pike County Airport, Elm Grove, Omega, Buchanan, Summithill, Knockemstiff, Ladd, Lake White, Smoky Corners, Scioto Trail State Park and Idaho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
